title: Support main LF team plat rank
body:
I am a decent player and play all supports all i want is a team that is organised and has consistency in how they play if u want to see more about my skill u can check my op.gg http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=TSM+YeIlow+Star
the only support i dislike playing are thresh and leona so dont expect me to play them 

im easy to talk to i shot called for my team before ive played in open ladder tournaments and ive supported a wide range of teams and also spent more time in teams then solo que so im not gonna be a rookie to synergy 

add me if interested also comment

replies.body: Heyy add me in game and we will talk :)
it says your Ign was not found
Why don't you create i team i'd be willing to join i'm currently a plat player myself and i would love to join.
i mean like ive tryed just doesnt seem to be ever enough people looking
i am a silver player but i deserve challenger easy! i would join ur tem if there was one
i would but i cant dynamic que with silver due to the rank gap soz man
